metadata.title: The Role of Climate in Fluctuations of Flatfishes in the Northwest Pacific

creators.name: Fisheries, Russian Federal Research Institute of Marine

metadata.description: In total,  Russian catch in the Far East Seas flatfishes constitutes only about 1.6%.  However, many flatfish species are very expensive at fish market.  In last years the intensity of flatfish fishery on the continental slope of the Northwest Pacific increased.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To show the role of climate in fluctuations of Flatfishes in the Northwest Pacific

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
